title: Its Time Something Has to be Done With Rylais.
body: Rylais is just really broken right now. It's giving better slows them most champions have in there kit. And all the meta mages right now bay this broken item. Remember DFG and why it so removed? It because it was giving much power with no couther play; That's what Rylais is doing right now. Riot, you keep nerfing the champions that use this item and not the item itself. I think Riot should remove it from the game.

Ultimately, the Slows did get nerfed when buffed Crystal Scepter. Particularly the way slows stack. (i.e. they don't anymore) And that was supposedly holding Crystal scepter back. (Because if scepter slow stacked with the slow from another mage, it would have been way ware oppressive) 

I wouldn't think you should simply remove all slows. (That would take away from some of the more unique mechanics form certain champs.) Though I would argue that Crystal Scepter shouldn't completely out shine those champs either. 

I see two potential problems. 1) Rylie's slow really is powerful enough to out shine other champs and dictate the meta. or 2) There's not a large enough opportunity cost building Crystal scepter over another item. (too gold efficient, too slot efficient, etc)

> [{quoted}](name=Jubilee Phoenix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OnQnPdhZ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-07-19T21:13:11.896+0000)

> Ok people, if the anti-slow tools work so well, then please tell me why all the meta mages build Rylais?

Looking at the LCS, the Meta mages are basically Viktor and Azir. And when I look at their kits, I simply find that they synergize too well with Rylais. 

For Azir, it should be obvious. His sand soldiers apply spell effect on his AA. and as a result, apply the slow constantly. Giving him way better zone control. And for Viktor, it's all in his ult. Since they changed his ult to be more DPS oriented, Rylais became important for keep his opponents in the electric field. 

But this doesn't give us the direction of the relationship. Is Rylais being abused because Azir and Viktor are OP? Or is Azir and Viktor being favored because Rylais is OP?

Then you need to buy a Banshee's or QSS if that is an issue with you. 

Mages only have 4 abilities to apply the slow with, so the slow itself is not permanent (plus the diminishing effect of CC stacking) unlike the AD versions of Mallet/Gauntlet. A good portion of the abilities are skillshots as well, so it's dodgeable.
